Location for the Static Web App

properties.scriptContent:
#!/bin/bash

echo "ğŸŒ³ Starting simplified deployment for $STATIC_WEB_APP_NAME"
echo "ğŸ“¦ Download URL: $DOWNLOAD_URL"
echo "ğŸ  Resource Group: $RESOURCE_GROUP_NAME"
echo "ğŸ“… Date: $(date)"

# Simple logging
log() {
    echo "[$(date +'%H:%M:%S')] $1"
}

# Check basics first - don't exit on errors
set +e

log "ğŸ”§ Checking Azure CLI..."
az version >/dev/null 2>&1
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
    log "âœ… Azure CLI is available"
else
    log "âŒ Azure CLI not available"
    exit 1
fi

log "ğŸ” Checking authentication..."
az account show >/dev/null 2>&1
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
    log "âœ… Authentication successful"
    ACCOUNT=$(az account show --query 'user.name' -o tsv 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown')
    log "ğŸ‘¤ User: $ACCOUNT"
else
    log "âŒ Authentication failed"
    exit 1
fi

# Re-enable error exit
set -e

log "ğŸ“ Creating temp directory..."
TEMP_DIR=$(mktemp -d)
log "ğŸ“ Temp dir: $TEMP_DIR"

log "ğŸ“¥ Downloading package..."
if curl -L --fail --connect-timeout 30 --max-time 180 "$DOWNLOAD_URL" -o "$TEMP_DIR/release.zip"; then
    log "âœ… Download successful"
else
    log "âŒ Download failed, trying GitHub fallback..."
    GITHUB_URL="https://github.com/OfirGavish/Group-Tree-Membership-Visualizer/releases/latest/download/group-tree-visualizer-latest.zip"
    if curl -L --fail --connect-timeout 30 --max-time 180 "$GITHUB_URL" -o "$TEMP_DIR/release.zip"; then
        log "âœ… GitHub download successful"
    else
        log "âŒ All downloads failed"
        exit 1
    fi
fi

# Check file
if [ ! -f "$TEMP_DIR/release.zip" ] || [ ! -s "$TEMP_DIR/release.zip" ]; then
    log "âŒ Downloaded file is empty or missing"
    exit 1
fi

FILE_SIZE=$(ls -lh "$TEMP_DIR/release.zip" | awk '{print $5}')
log "ğŸ“¦ Package size: $FILE_SIZE"

log "ğŸ“‚ Extracting..."
if unzip -q "$TEMP_DIR/release.zip" -d "$TEMP_DIR/extracted"; then
    log "âœ… Extraction successful"
else
    log "âŒ Extraction failed"
    exit 1
fi

# Find static files
STATIC_DIR="$TEMP_DIR/extracted"
if [ -f "$TEMP_DIR/extracted/index.html" ]; then
    log "ğŸ“„ Found index.html in root"
elif [ -f "$TEMP_DIR/extracted/static/index.html" ]; then
    STATIC_DIR="$TEMP_DIR/extracted/static"
    log "ğŸ“„ Found index.html in static folder"
else
    log "âŒ No index.html found"
    log "ğŸ“‹ Contents:"
    find "$TEMP_DIR/extracted" -name "*.html" | head -5
    exit 1
fi

FILE_COUNT=$(find "$STATIC_DIR" -type f | wc -l)
log "ğŸ“Š Files to deploy: $FILE_COUNT"

log "ğŸ”‘ Getting deployment token..."
set +e
DEPLOYMENT_TOKEN=$(az staticwebapp secrets list --name "$STATIC_WEB_APP_NAME" --resource-group "$RESOURCE_GROUP_NAME" --query "properties.apiKey" -o tsv 2>/dev/null)
TOKEN_RESULT=$?
set -e

if [ $TOKEN_RESULT -ne 0 ] || [ -z "$DEPLOYMENT_TOKEN" ] || [ "$DEPLOYMENT_TOKEN" = "null" ]; then
    log "âŒ Failed to get deployment token"
    log "ğŸ” Checking if Static Web App exists..."
    
    set +e
    az staticwebapp show --name "$STATIC_WEB_APP_NAME" --resource-group "$RESOURCE_GROUP_NAME" >/dev/null 2>&1
    if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
        log "âœ… Static Web App exists"
    else
        log "âŒ Static Web App not found"
    fi
    set -e
    
    exit 1
fi

log "âœ… Token obtained (${#DEPLOYMENT_TOKEN} chars)"

log "ğŸš€ Deploying..."
set +e
DEPLOY_OUTPUT=$(az staticwebapp deploy --name "$STATIC_WEB_APP_NAME" --resource-group "$RESOURCE_GROUP_NAME" --source "$STATIC_DIR" --deployment-token "$DEPLOYMENT_TOKEN" 2>&1)
DEPLOY_RESULT=$?
set -e

if [ $DEPLOY_RESULT -eq 0 ]; then
    log "âœ… Deployment successful!"
    log "ğŸŒ URL: https://$STATIC_WEB_APP_NAME.azurestaticapps.net"
else
    log "âŒ Deployment failed (exit code: $DEPLOY_RESULT)"
    log "ğŸ“‹ Output: $DEPLOY_OUTPUT"
    exit 1
fi

log "ğŸ§¹ Cleaning up..."
rm -rf "$TEMP_DIR"

log "ğŸ‰ Deployment complete!"
log "ğŸ“Š Summary: $FILE_COUNT files deployed"
log "ğŸŒ App URL: https://$STATIC_WEB_APP_NAME.azurestaticapps.net"
